meanings.definition: A type of bean commonly used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added some catjang to the stew for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for catjang beans, but I used kidney beans instead.
meanings.sent3: The catjang beans danced in the pot as they cooked.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering catjang filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The catjang beans were like little nuggets of goodness in the dish.

meanings.definition: To plant or cultivate catjang beans.
meanings.sent1: I will catjang the seeds in the garden tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: Farmers catjang their crops in the fertile soil every spring.
meanings.sent3: The gardener decided to catjang the beans in a heart shape.
meanings.sent4: She catjanged the beans with care, ensuring they had enough sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The act of catjanging the beans brought a sense of satisfaction.

meanings.definition: The act of consuming catjang beans as food.
meanings.sent1: The delicious catjang was the highlight of the meal.
meanings.sent2: People in the region enjoy catjang as a staple in their diet.
meanings.sent3: The catjang beans in the dish disappeared quickly as everyone savored them.
meanings.sent4: She relished the catjang beans, savoring each bite.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cooking catjang beans made everyone's mouth water.
